customerInfo.title: Your details

note.note1: Booking confirmation email will be sent to this address
note.note2: So that we can contact you to confirm your room

customerInfo.warning: Please fill in the information in Vietnamese or English

FAQ.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQ.content: If you want to know more about the hotel, you can see guest inquiries

request.title: Special Requests
request.note: Special requests are not guaranteed â€“ however, the property will do its best to accommodate. You can always submit a special request after completing your reservation!

card.content2: 24-hour front desk - Help is always there when you need it!
card.title: Add your expected arrival time

item1.title: Check in
item1.desc1: Guests are required to present a photo ID and credit card upon check-in

item3.title: Cancellation of booking/payment
item3.desc: Cancellation and prepayment policies vary based on the time of booking.

item4.title: Damage deposit is refundable
item4.desc: VND 700000 deposit required for damage upon arrival. This amount will be collected by the property in cash. You will be refunded upon check-out. Your deposit will be fully refunded in cash, but also subject to the amount of damage you may have caused at the property.

item5.title: Children and beds
item5.desc1: Children of all ages are welcome.
item5.desc2: To see accurate rates and availability, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

item6.title: Check-in age
item6.desc: There is no age requirement at check-in

item7.title: Cards are accepted at this property
item7.desc: Sherwood Residence accepts these cards and reserves the right to temporarily hold an amount prior to arrival.
